name: Merchant's House
unlockCondition: 7,500,000 ducats total wealth, Merchant Guild connection
calculationsAnalysis: The Merchant's House represents middle-class housing with business capabilities. The construction cost of 1,600,000 ducats reflects the quality construction and business facilities, while the income of 30,000 ducats (1.9% return) represents both residential rent and commercial activities. The maintenance cost of 7,500 ducats (25% of income) creates an appropriate maintenance ratio for this tier, reflecting the more complex structure and higher standards. The residentsCapacity of 7 represents the merchant family with servants. The construction time of 4 days (345600000ms) reflects the more sophisticated construction. This building creates a progression into middle-class housing with appropriate guild requirements reflecting the social organization of Renaissance Venice, where guild membership was essential for commercial activities.
shortDescription: Comfortable residence with dedicated office space for business dealings.
fullDescription: A respectable home for Venice's merchant class, featuring separate areas for business and family life. Typically includes a ground floor counting room or office, a piano nobile (noble floor) for family living, and often additional floors for storage or servants. Represents success in Venice's trading world.
